Plot: Four guys sit around drinking beer and talking, trying to figure out the meaning of "the pompatus of love" (from the Steve Miller song "Joker") and analyzing their relationships with women.
Title: The Pompatus of Love
Writer: Jon Cryer, Adam Oliensis, Richard Schenkman
Actors: Adrian Pasdar, Paige Turco, Arabella Field, Dana Wheeler-Nicholson
